- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

### Description

SRv6 Terminology updates to align with public specifications. Transit.* -> Headend.* and SRv6 Func or SRv6 End -> SRv6 Endpoint.

N/A

- (L7010)	{L2FIB-STATS-BAG-FORWARDING}/dispostion-stats
